name: Onchain Music featuring THE JACKSON FIVE
description: Fireside chat with Jesse focusing on the origins of the projects, the benefits for the music industry, why building onchain, "digital vinyls" and drops.

speakers.name: Oscar Moerke
speakers.bio: Head of Product and Founding Team Member at anotherblock, a Stockholm-based music tech platform launched in August 2022 with the aim of empowering the emotional and financial connection between creators and consumers. anotherblock provides a seamless and user-friendly platform for buying music rights and unique music collectibles.

speakers.name: Michel Dahlberg Traore
speakers.bio: CEO and Co-Founder of anotherblock, a Stockholm-based music tech platform launched in August 2022 with the aim of empowering the emotional and financial connection between creators and consumers. anotherblock provides a seamless and user-friendly platform for buying music rights and unique music collectibles.

speakers.name: Jesse Pollak
speakers.bio: Jesse Pollak is Creator of Base. Prior to Base, Jesse led all of Coinbaseâ€™s consumer-facing engineering from early 2017 to middle 2021, including building Coinbase, Coinbase Pro, and Coinbase Wallet. Jesse joined Coinbase through the acquisition of Clef, a company he founded and ran for five years that built passwordless identity solutions for crypto companies.
